title: Tress game: festive hairstyles for Diwali
text:
EASY HAIRSTYLES



You can never go wrong with the low bun, hon.

The low bun serves as the perfect hairstyle for the times when you're in a rush. Timelessly elegant and chic, this hairdo looks ethereally good on a sari. Here's how you can get this look. Start off by making a centre partition in your hair. Tie a ponytail at the base of your hairline and start braiding it. Secure it with a hair tie at the end. Then wrap your braid right around the bottom of your ponytail and fasten it neatly with the help of bobby pins. And that's about it! Go out and flaunt your gorgeous hairdo.
description: Get your tress game on point this festive season. Here are some easy mane hacks for Diwali. Know more.
